animeDescription: The story is about Hikaru Tatsumura who came from Brazil to fulfill his dream to be a great soccer player because he met a great player once who was admired by all people. However Tatsumura is a very cheerful person  and easy going except when it is about soccer. He becomes serious and strong. He also gives a unique performance such as doing a funny dance with his buddy after he makes a goal. Tatsumura will face a lot of challenges with his team while aiming for success.
animeStaff: [['Okajima Kunitoshi', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Higuchi Masakazu', ['Director']], ['Yamauchi Shigeyasu', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Ishiodori Hiroshi', ['Episode Director']]]
